data.actual_result: Tooltip doesn't disappear when mousing off, and is hard to get rid of
data.expected_result: Tooltip disappears when you mouse off the button
data.short_description: Spotify invite tooltip for the join button gets stuck open hovering
data.steps_to_repro: - Start listening to music on Spotify - Send an invite to the listening party in a channel - Mouse over the join button - Move your mouse off of the button and observe the tooltip
